title: Smoked haddock Welsh rarebit with tomato chutney
description: This smoked haddock, coated generously in a punchy cheese sauce, would make a spectacular start or end to any lazy weekend.
ingredients: 4 x 175g/6oz smoked haddock fillets, skin removed
6 plum tomatoes, 3 skin removed and chopped, 3 thinly sliced and reserved to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
